subject: World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: England's soccer team returned home in defeat and dismay from the World Cup, its future and fortunes uncertain after David Beckham resigned the captaincy he had held for six years and 58 games.
snippet: England's soccer team returned home in defeat and dismay from the World Cup, its future and fortunes uncertain after David Beckham resigned the captaincy he had held for six years and 58 games.
